item.title: Star Wars Galxies
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I purchased a few months of it and I absolutly loved it. It was a very nice change from your average fantasy game, and I just loved flying in space shooting down other players space ships, hours of fun. The movement, animations, graphics, and gameplay all are great. Oh yeah and plus it has StarWars music and everything, it really gets your adreneline running somehow. I hate star wars movies and crap, but the games are always good. I still need to try Eve Online though, itâ€™s another space mmorpg.
